description.narrative:
(a) Project Impact Assessment- (i) increase availability and coverage of the 3G network in Iraq, thus increasing consumers' potential access to mobile broadband; (ii) improve the capacity and quality of the 3G mobile network, allowing consumers to use more data and data applications; (iii) contribute to Iraq's economic growth due to spillover effects across many sectors as a result of increase in mobile broadband penetration.
(b) Market Impact Assessment- (i) Resilience - IFC anticipates the project will result in lasting systemic improvements in reconnecting the recently liberated areas with Baghdad, in the absence of landlines, and supporting crisis response and digital identity to displaced and refugee populations, (ii) Competitiveness - IFC anticipates that the project, by improving the capacity of data connectivity in the country, will help improve competitiveness of businesses in Iraq and stimulate innovation and entrepreneurship in the country as broadband will provide the businesses access to knowledge and information, banking and payment platforms and boost their productivity.

mailing-address.narrative: ATHEER TELECOM IRAQ LIMITED SAMER MUSLEH CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER +964 780 296 9854 Samer.musleh@zain.com Bldg. 47, Str. 14,District 605 Hay Al Mutanabi, Al Mansoor, Baghdad, Iraq www.zain.com
